result.execSummary:
The defendant Lynn L Windsor was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Must report to Probation by 12/30/2015.
Must follow through with requirements of Probation.

miscConds.notes: Must provide DNA sample and pay a $200.00 DNA surcharge.  Bond in 15CM223 to be applied to surcharges in 15CM223 and 15CM347 with remaining balance refunded to poster.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lynn L Windsor

records.addlTxt: Voucher to DOA for Polk Co Treas to pay $991.44 Ct App'ted Atty Fees for 14CM593, 15CM223, 15CM347. Def assessed and PP set up - Copies and PP summary to parties.

CASES:  14CM593, 15CM223, 15CM347.  Defendant Lynn L Windsor in court with attorney John M. O'Boyle.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  BJM-clerk 9:52 am 

14CM593:  CT - Dismissed outright.

15CM223:
Ct 1 - Def - NC plea.  CT accepts plea, adj Def G & enters JOC.  
Cts 2-4 - DRI 

15CM347: Def - G plea.  CT accepts plea, adj Def G & enters JOC.  

SENTENCE:
15CM223 - w/h sent, up to 1 yr prob, follow thru w/req of probation, Must provide sample & pay $200 surchg.  Bond in 15CM223 to be applied to costs.  Waive fines/costs. No Rest.  Sign up w/Prob by Wed, 12/30.  

15CM347 - w/h sent, up to 1 yr prob, follow thru w/req of probation, Must provide sample & pay $200 surchg.  Bond in 15CM223 to be applied to costs.  Waive fines/costs.  No Rest.  Sign up w/Prob by Wed, 12/30.  

PCR.  10:16 am

CASES: 14CM593, 15CM223 & 15CM347. Defendant Lynn L Windsor in court with attorney John M. O'Boyle.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 3:30 pm.  Bonds cont.  3:34 pm adj.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 28, 2015 at 09:30 am.

CASES: 15CM347, 15CM223 & 14CM593. Defendant Lynn L Windsor in court with attorney John M. O'Boyle.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 10:57 AM
15CM347-NG plea.  Bond has been set.  WST.  Bonds cont.  11:00 am adj.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 9, 2015 at 03:00 pm.

Not to possess or consume alcohol.  Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.  Not to commit any new crimes.  Must appear at all future court appearances.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.

Daniel Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Shelly Tomtschik appeared for Defendant Lynn Windsor.  Defendant Lynn Windsor in custody.  BJM-clerk 1:04 pm Fred Bechtold is atty for underlying cases.  Case will be admin transferred to Br 2.  219 Keller Avenue N #1, Amery.  $2500 SIBS. AIA set for 10/6/15, at 2:30 pm.  1:09 pm adj.
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint.
